Enter your Custom Letter-Code --> Will be added to the 5x5-Tab in the APP from left to right, just like you read the Newspaper.
'#####################
START Letter-Codes
0010001110110111111110001
1110010010111001001011100
0111010000100001000001110
1110010010100101001011100
1111010000111001000011110
1111100100011100010000100
1111010000101101001011110

0100001000010000100001110
